entry.title: Defining an Enterprise Penetration Test
entry.content:
Are Enterprises Aware Of A Defined Penetration Test?

It really took me a complete decade to have a meaningful dedicated routine time having few legit set of questions & debunks we’ll be looking at frequencies from here onwards. After having experienced a large number of strategic targets for our business commitments, I have now concluded the larger scale enterprises lack a defined understanding of what a Penetration Test really is.

.. wait - don’t be waiting any longer to have a second thought about mistaking the wide information security domain with just a penetration test. The width I’m talking takes grasping this wide domain .. I’ll leave you there.
